com.javagameengine.assets

Class AssetManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.javagameengine.assets.AssetManager

  • public class AssetManager
extends java.lang.Object
    AssetManager is a statically accessed class which maintains access to all game related objects. The manager loads all the assets located in the main game directory on runtime, and allows for objects to be added or removed during runtime.
